p: The data in Table 3 show that stable nanoemulsion systems were obtained with both methods, for all six fragrance compositions, with Etocas 35 (PEG-35 castor oil) only among four of the tested emulsifiers. Nanoemulsions obtained by the US method had properties similar to formulations obtained with a PIC method. Z-Ave diameter and PDI did not show any significant differences ( p > 0.05).
